page.title: 11CURRIE RURAL INSTITUTE
page.content: Mrs S is a member of the WRI in Currie. They meet in Currie every second Tuesday at Currie Hill School, where attendances of 70 people are expected. She joined 24 years ago in Ratho. There is no age limit to joining but the majority of members joined at the age of 25. They have talks about such things as living on an oilrig or fire prevention and they have also had talks from a local doctor. They also make handcrafts or demonstrate cookery. Mrs S was president from 1978-1981. They have been on outings to the GPO,the Edinburgh Crystal Factory and a candleworks. They also go for an annual picnic. Every three years there is a Conference Meeting, which was held this year, 1985, in Edinburgh.
